thesis.title: Data-based Generation of Reliability Models
thesis.details: Developing an automated method of extracting a fault tree representation of a system from time series data.

education.details: As an electrical engineer specializing in embedded systems, I have gained experience in developing software on embedded devices and control systems.

thesis.title: Testing of AUTOSAR I-PDU Multiplexer
thesis.details: Unit testing of a basic software module called I-PDU Multiplexer in the AUTOSAR, a standardized automotive software architecture, at ThyssenKrupp Presta Hungary.
